desc: BACKGROUNDER - The first door opening was on Sussex Drive (Canada’s street) in spring of 1988. It wasn’t long after that Art Mode would become a force in the design and display of visual arts and sculpture within its retail reach. The retail side had lots of color and color was promoted as energy as we entered the
